statements: SELECT * FROM media_producers WHERE producer_id = 1;
SELECT producer_name, license_type FROM media_producers ORDER BY producer_name ASC;
SELECT producer_id, producer_name, license_number FROM media_producers WHERE license_type = 'Film' ORDER BY producer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_producers WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT license_type FROM media_producers;
SELECT * FROM media_producers WHERE producer_id = 1;
SELECT producer_name, license_number, issue_date FROM media_producers WHERE license_type = 'film';
SELECT producer_name, expiry_date FROM media_producers WHERE issue_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM media_producers WHERE license_type IS NULL;
SELECT producer_id, license_number FROM media_producers WHERE producer_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM media_producers;
SELECT producer_name, license_type, license_number FROM media_producers;
SELECT producer_name, license_type, license_number FROM media_producers WHERE license_type = 'Music';
SELECT producer_name, license_type, license_number FROM media_producers ORDER BY producer_name ASC;
SELECT producer_name, license_type, license_number FROM media_producers WHERE producer_id = 2;
SELECT producer_name, license_type FROM media_producers ORDER BY producer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT producer_name, license_type FROM media_producers WHERE license_type = 'Full' ORDER BY producer_name DESC;
SELECT producer_name, license_type, license_number FROM media_producers WHERE license_type = 'Limited' AND license_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY license_number;

SELECT producer_name, license_type, h.license_status, h.license_expiry_date FROM media_producers p INNER JOIN license_history h ON p.producer_id = h.producer_id WHERE h.license_status = 'Active' ORDER BY h.license_expiry_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT license_type) AS unique_license_types, license_type FROM media_producers GROUP BY license_type HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT license_type) > 1 ORDER BY unique_license_types DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_producers;
SELECT producer_name, license_number FROM media_producers ORDER BY producer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM licenses WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-11-30';
SELECT license_number, issued_date FROM licenses WHERE producer_id = 3;
SELECT body_name, jurisdiction FROM regulatory_bodies ORDER BY body_name;
SELECT * FROM media_producers WHERE producer_name = 'ABC Productions';
SELECT producer_name, license_number FROM media_producers ORDER BY producer_name ASC;
SELECT body_name AS RegulatoryBody, jurisdiction AS Location FROM regulatory_bodies WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA';
SELECT mf.producer_name, l.issued_date, l.expiration_date FROM media_producers mf INNER JOIN licenses l ON mf.producer_id = l.producer_id;
SELECT producer_name, license_number FROM media_producers WHERE license_number LIKE '%123%' AND producer_id IN (SELECT producer_id FROM licenses WHERE issued_date > '2022-01-01');
SELECT * FROM media_producers;
SELECT producer_name, license_number FROM media_producers WHERE producer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM licenses WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT producer_id, producer_name FROM media_producers ORDER BY producer_name DESC;
SELECT producer_name, license_number, expiration_date FROM media_producers JOIN licenses ON media_producers.producer_id = licenses.producer_id;
SELECT * FROM media_producers;
SELECT producer_name, license_number FROM media_producers ORDER BY producer_name DESC;
SELECT producer_name, license_number FROM media_producers WHERE producer_id > 3 ORDER BY license_number;
SELECT lh.record_id, lh.license_id, l.issue_date, l.expiration_date, lh.status FROM license_history lh JOIN licenses l ON lh.license_id = l.license_id WHERE lh.status = 'active';

SELECT p.producer_name, l.license_number, lh.issue_date FROM media_producers p JOIN licenses l ON p.producer_id = l.producer_id JOIN license_history lh ON l.license_id = lh.license_id WHERE lh.status = 'expired' ORDER BY lh.issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_producers;
SELECT producer_name, license_expiry_date FROM media_producers WHERE license_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_title, release_date, content_type FROM media_content ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM content_categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Entertainment%';
SELECT log_id, action_time, action_type FROM license_audit_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT producer_name, license_number FROM media_producers WHERE license_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_title, release_date, content_type FROM media_content ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM content_categories WHERE LENGTH(category_name) > 10;
SELECT log_id, action_time, action_type, user_id FROM license_audit_logs WHERE user_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT c.content_title, p.producer_name FROM media_content c JOIN media_producers p ON c.producer_id = p.producer_id;
